title: Scientists Create the Blackest Shade of Black | Jodi Kantor & Megan Twohey
itunes:title: Scientists Create the Blackest Shade of Black | Jodi Kantor & Megan Twohey
description:
Tensions flare over an attack on Saudi Arabia's oil supply, Roy Wood Jr. throws shade on the blackest material on Earth, and Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey discuss "She Said."

 

Wondery's The Lead: http://wondery.fm/TheLeadDS

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
